    Alumni Events



Whether you want to reconnect with your alma mater and Panthers in the spirit of networking, celebrate fellow alumni, or have pure fun and a good time, we've got you covered with plenty of opportunities!
Check out Alumni opportunities below:

View all alumni-specific events »
View all career-specific events and information
View all campus events open to the entire Chapman Family » 

To find out how the coronavirus is affecting on-campus Chapman events, please visit the University’s Coronavirus Updates and Resources site.
If you have questions about future events, please contact the Office of Alumni Engagement at (714) 997-6681 or email us at alumni@chapman.edu.









      Chappy Hour
  


        Connect with alumni at a fun-filled happy hour at a location near you! 
Visit the Chappy Hour page to learn more or you can contact the Office of Alumni Engagement via email at alumni@chapman.edu, or phone at (714) 997-6681.
      








      Alumni Mimosa Brunch
  

        Join your fellow alumni for a delicious bottomless mimosa brunch and Greek Skit every April. Details for the next event will be posted in the Spring. Check back in March 2023!
      









      Economic Forecast Update & Conference
  


        Enjoy your special alumni discounted ticket price every June at the Economic Forecast Update and every December at the Economic Forecast Conference.
      









      The Chapman Family Homecoming Celebration
  


        Enjoy being welcomed home for a Panther Pride-filled weekend with your entire Chapman Family. Enjoy masterclasses, a tailgate in the Piazza, and, of course, cheer on the football team at Wilson Field!
      









      50 Year Club Reunion
  


        If you graduated 50 years ago, join your class in celebrating your reunion during the Chapman Family Homecoming Celebration this year! 
      








      Winterfest and Doyâs Holiday Tree Lighting
  

        Kick off the holiday season with your Chapman Family at our most festive tradition each November.
      









      Chapman Celebrates
  


        Don't miss Chapman's signature stage show with a spectacular ensemble of more than 100 students each November.
